title: Recovery of pending dues such as assessment, compensation, occupational charges, non- agricultural tax / dues etc
clause_text: Recovery of pending dues such as assessment, compensation, occupational charges, non- agricultural tax / dues etc. pending with public authorities such as State Govt., MHADA, and / or Municipal Corporation shall be dealt with separately and not be linked to grant of approval or building permission to the slum rehabilitation projects.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
